Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionController  
    Controller
    Main controller class, it calls several "game phase" controllers, like the turn one, or the action one.
    GodSelectionController
    Controller of the god powers selection, made by the challenger, and the card choosing made by players.
    TurnController
    Turn controller handling turn's moves and routing actions to the Action Controller
